questions.question: This arc is centered on a prison fortress in the Calm Belt and features Luffy's attempt to rescue his brother, Portgas D. Ace. What is...?
This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
Set on a frozen island, this arc involves the Straw Hat Pirates and the G-5 marines against a former Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This ability, showcased by a Straw Hat crew member, grants the power to manipulate and become sand. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This captain of the Kid Pirates is known for his magnetic powers and rivalry with the Straw Hat Pirates' captain. Who is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
